rooms.description: Open plan area combining living and dining spaces, with Kerala traditional carved wood elements.
Modern open-plan kitchen integrated with the living area, featuring local stone countertops and natural ventilation.
Dedicated dining space within the open plan layout, designed for family gatherings.
Integrated living and kitchen area with ample natural light from large windows.
Spacious master bedroom aligned with Vastu principles, north facing for positive energy.
Additional bedroom designed for privacy and comfort.
Third bedroom to accommodate additional needs, ensuring natural ventilation through Vastu guidelines.
Well-appointed bathroom with local stone finishes and functional design following traditional Kerala aesthetics.

openings.description: Main entrance door designed in a traditional style with natural wood and intricate carvings.
Large windows to maximize morning light and ventilation in the living area, following Vastu orientation guidelines.
Strategically placed windows to ensure proper air circulation and natural light in the kitchen.
Small balcony adjoining the living area for additional outdoor space, promoting airflow.

common_spaces.description: Compact private gym integrated on the ground floor with proper ventilation and natural light, designed according to traditional Kerala aesthetics.
Utility area for storage, ensuring efficient space management in line with Vastu principles.

level_features.description: Incorporates traditional Kerala wood carvings and locally sourced stone, enhancing aesthetic appeal while respecting cultural heritage.
